fields.title: Recycling - Art Mission
fields.action: Make art with your garbage
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, we almost lost everything on my planet because all the stuff we were buying was producing too much C02. Our greatest artists decided to use only recycled material to inspire us to change.

fields.title: Recycling - Learning Mission
fields.action: Learn about plastic symbols for recycling and find a 1 or 2 symbol in your house
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, Earth has a lot of strange symbols on materials to communicate what can be recycled. On my planet we learnt to not buy things that can't be recycled?

fields.title: Recycling - Fridge Mission
fields.action: Organize your fridge to reduce waste
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, us Zerons decided to have shared food storage with our community so things don't go to waste. Can you show me a well organized fridge on Earth?

fields.title: Recycling - Reminder Mission
fields.action: Make a Sign out of recycled materials to inspire you to recycle. Put it near the garbage
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, to be honest my memory isn't the best so I learnt to use reminders to help me recycle.

fields.title: Recycling - Gifting Mission
fields.action: Give away something you don't need
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, on our planet we believe the best gift you can give someone is something you recycled or don't need anymore

fields.title: Recycling - Open your wallet
fields.action: Donate money to help recycling efforts
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, on our planet money works a bit different, we give what we don't need to help people doing important work.

fields.title: Diet - Learning Mission
fields.action: Learn what is your favorite low carbon emission food
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, Zerons loved eating Wagl, but making Wagl produce a lot of CO2, so our food scientists came up with a similar tasting food that produced less C02. Can you show me your favorite low carbon emission food?

fields.title: Diet - Cooking Mission
fields.action: Commit to cooking a low carbon emission dinner once a week
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, I'm a famous chef on my planet cooking low carbon tasty food. But I don't know about Earth food. Can you show me Earth meals?

fields.title: Diet - Open your wallet
fields.action: Buy some of the tastiest plant based food
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, I love cooking my food. I also love tasting things other people make that have low carbon emission. Can you buy me something to taste?

fields.title: Diet - Grow Veggies
fields.action: Grow your own food
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, it took me some time to learn to grow things on my planet. I wonder how it is on Earth? Please show me!

fields.title: Energy - Learning Mission
fields.action: Learn which renewable energy works best for where you live
fields.learn_more: I'm EL, the science minister. To save our planet everyone learnt about innovations in energy and how creating C02 could be prevented. Can you show me which renewable energy works best for where you live

fields.title: Energy - Reminder Mission
fields.action: Make a sign from recycled materials to remind you to turn off lights before you go to bed to and put it somewhere you will see before going to bed
fields.learn_more: I'm EL, not all your light bulbs on Earth are the same, incandescent light bulbs are very wasteful, fluorescent lights take a lot of electricity to start so turn them off only if you will be gone for more than 15 min. LEDs are very efficient!

fields.title: Energy - Open your wallet for Solar Panels
fields.action: Buy (or ask your homeowner to buy) solar panels
fields.learn_more: I'm EL, your sun is such a magnificent source of power, you are so lucky. Our planet was further away from the sun. Can you buy some solar powered technology?

fields.title: Energy - Open your wallet for LED light bulbs
fields.action: Buy (or ask your homeowner to buy) LED light bulbs
fields.learn_more: I'm EL, when I was young I studied why LED light bulbs are more efficient, they use electroluminescence, electrons jump to lower energy bands and release energy as light! Buy some?

fields.title: Offset - Learning Mission
fields.action: Learn what is a CIRCULAR ECONOMY and show us a symbol that reminds you of the concept.
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, I'm the minister of Economy on my planet. We've learnt to make money work for our planet. I hear on Earth you call this CIRCULAR ECONOMY

fields.title: Offset - Company Mission
fields.action: Learn which companies are helping save the planet and show us a product you like from one of these companies.
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, when things got dangerous on our planet all Zeros stopped buying or working for companies that didn't care for the planet and the companies changed!

fields.title: Offset - Listening Mission
fields.action: Subscribe to one of these podcasts about technology that is helping to save the planet. Show us which technology or company impressed you the most
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, the more I learn about the innovations on Earth the more confident I am that you too can save your planet!

fields.title: Offset - Action Mission
fields.action: Add browser plugins that offset your carbon with no cost to you and share them with friends
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, I'm impressed with these ideas that help you save the planet with one or two click of this device called a mouse?!?

fields.title: Offset - Open Your Wallet Mission
fields.action: Donate to one of these impressive ideas to offset your carbon
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, when I started to save our planet with an idea I had generous people helped me build it

fields.title: Transport - Learning Mission
fields.action: Show us which is the lowest emission transportation mode that makes sense for where you live?
fields.learn_more: I'm Gogo, our planet is 3 times bigger than Earth, We learned we could minimize our carbon emissions by being smart about how we get around.

fields.title: Transport - Motivation
fields.action: Use one of these ways to motivate you use your feet to save the planet
fields.learn_more: I'm Gogo, I've learned it's very healthy for humans to walk or bike just remember that how you replenish your calories matters too.

fields.title: Transport - Open Your Wallet
fields.action: Buy one of these low carbon transportation.
fields.learn_more: I'm Gogo, I love some of the wheeled transportation devices you have on Earth. Can you buy one for me?

fields.description: 4 years of trash turned into art

Contribute to research to create clothes that absorb your carbon!
Contribute to help us keep building this game!

In depth review of transportation carbon footprint from C2es.org.
